analyzed: bgrod med rnam ba grol ba lam ston ba

analyzed: thig le chen po kun la khyab ba gnas

analyzed: rang byung ye shes ma chos d gsal ba

analyzed: snang mdzad nyid ni rtag ba kun tu bzang

analyzed: gnyis med bde ba ngang ste lhun gyis grub

analyzed: g.yung drung chen po klong du char ba yis

analyzed: bde ba chen po longs spyod rdzogs ba yang

analyzed: rtogs dpyod mtshan ma kun las da ba phyir

original: drang srong chen po nyid kyi spyod yul yin //
analyzed: dren srong chen po nyid kyi spyod yul yin

original: thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la //
analyzed: thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil khor la
